ROM.Changelog:
==================== 04-19-2017 ====================
* device/lenovo/A7010a48/ 1409678 sepolicy denial fixes [ganeshi4u] e7a6114 building this from source [ganeshi4u] * frameworks/base/ 06e657f Force Expanded Notifications [1/2] (#18) [Aditya Upreti] * kernel/lenovo/A7010a48-up/ 4210291 update defconfig [ganeshi4u] * packages/apps/Galaxy/ 118dd35 Force Expanded Notifications [2/2] (#3) [Aditya Upreti] * packages/apps/OTAUpdates/ 3712237 MainActivity: Fix duplication in info fields [Harsh Shandilya] * packages/apps/Settings/ bc50c5b Add Lenovo K4 Note(A7010a48) (#37) [Aditya Upreti] * vendor/lenovo/A7010a48/ 37a316a this is needed [ganeshi4u] c02182a added fingerprintd from stock [ganeshi4u] 70a0110 clean up omx [ganeshi4u] cc94c8a remove unnecessary drm blobs [ganeshi4u] 6734219 OMX updates [ganeshi4u]
==================== 04-18-2017 ====================
* kernel/lenovo/A7010a48-up/ caa5972f staging/android/ion : fix a race condition in the ion driver [ganeshi4u] b4a77d5 packet: fix race condition in packet_set_ring [ganeshi4u] 5481f88 arm64: make sys_call_table const [ganeshi4u] cde872c UPSTREAM: perf: Fix race in swevent hash [ganeshi4u] b71ac8f ext4: fix potential use after free in __ext4_journal_stop [ganeshi4u] 29fa260 HID: core: prevent out-of-bound readings [ganeshi4u] 5d40a90 tty: Prevent ldisc drivers from re-using stale tty fields [ganeshi4u] a8d1ba5 perf: Fix race in swevent hash [ganeshi4u] bde0bd0 xc2028: avoid use after free [ganeshi4u] ead3738 sg: Fix double-free when drives detach during SG_IO In sg_common_write(), we free the block request and return -ENODEV if the device is detached in the middle of the SG_IO ioctl(). 5c80ba8 android: fiq_debugger: fix cut-off help message [ganeshi4u] d1d7724 staging: Remove logger and alarm-dev from android Makefile [ganeshi4u] 123e576 staging: Remove the Android alarm-dev driver [ganeshi4u] 0080a6b staging: Remove the Android logger driver [ganeshi4u] 88b3c3e msm: null pointer dereferencing [ganeshi4u] ab98242 arm64: kernel: perf: add cpu hotplug notifier [ganeshi4u] 6e1e24c UPSTREAM: proc: actually make proc_fd_permission() thread-friendly [ganeshi4u] 0ba0336 mt6735: Fix RDS struct mismatch between user-space and kernel-space [ganeshi4u] 64f9114 slub: do not assert not having lock in removing freed partial [ganeshi4u] 62ae564 mm: slub: work around unneeded lockdep warning [ganeshi4u]
